TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataControlFieldCell extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell

Docs.summary: Represents a cell in the rendered table of a tabular ASP.NET data-bound control, such as or .

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> class is a strongly typed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> class that represents a cell in ASP.NET data-bound controls that render their contents in a tabular layout, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object that contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object controls how the cell is rendered by applying styles to the cell. You can access the containing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell.ContainingField%2A> property.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object can be used and manipulated by a class that derives from <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField>. The `RadioButtonField` class adds a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButton> control to each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.InitializeCell%2A> method, and later checks the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButton> control in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ExtractValuesFromCell%2A> method. This example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> class.
[!code-csharp[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/CS/radiobuttonfield.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Samples.AspNet.RadioButtonField/VB/radiobuttonfield.vb#2)]

Docs.param: The that contains the current cell.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the specified object as the cell's container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag?displayProperty=fullName> element defined by its base class to render the cell. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> object passed in the `containingField` parameter is used to determine whether to show headers and what styles to apply to the cell when it is rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(valuetype System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriterTag tagKey, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField containingField) cil managed

Docs.param: An that specifies the HTML tag to render for the cell. The default tag used by the class is .
The that contains the current cell.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, setting the specified object as the cell's container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `tagKey` parameter is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl> base class constructor, and controls the HTML tag that is emitted by the control. The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> passed in the `containingField` parameter is used to determine whether to show headers and what styles to apply to the cell when it is rendered.

Docs.summary: Gets the object that contains the current cell.
Docs.value: A that contains the current cell, or , if no is passed to the class constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The content rendering for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlFieldCell> object might be affected by the various <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField> properties of the containing field, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ItemStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ControlStyle%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlField.ShowHeader%2A>.
